DOC.brief_summary: This transmission pilot study prospective study determine feasibility enrol female partner international transmission study . Companion study MCC-13930 .
DOC.brief_title: The Human Papillomavirus ( HPV ) Transmission Pilot Study
DOC.detailed_description: We plan enroll 150 female sexual partner , 75 per year 2 year , male study participant HPV Infection Men ( HIM ) Study . The enrollment period June 2006 May 2008 participant follow May 2010 . At study visit participant undergo interview , physical exam laboratory analysis HPV total 5 clinical visit schedule every 6 month 2 year follow-up . In addition , study visit , participant provide blood HPV antibody analyse . At enrollment , visit 3 visit 5 Pap smear test do . At enrollment visit , study participant complete questionnaire design ass social behavioral risk factor acquisition HPV . At subsequent study visit , participant ask provide update information ass change risk behavior condom use , relation new partner , tobacco use .
DOC.criteria: Female partner HIM Study participant report abnormal Pap smear past 6 month ; hysterectomy never diagnose genital wart ; pregnant ; resident southern Florida ; enrol HPV vaccine trial ; willing comply schedule visit every 6 month 2 year . Do meet Inclusion Criteria .
